structure.unit: General Provisions Relative To State Departments, Commissions, Officers And Employees

law.catch_line: Special Reports To State Purchasing Agent; Appeals
law.text: State officers, departments or heads thereof may make such special reports as the state purchasing agent deems to be of practical utility. Appeal may be taken from any decision of the state purchasing agent hereunder to the committee of the executive council appointed to consider matters of finance whose decision shall be final.
